alert.note: Alert for Craig (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 19 at 8:41PM CDT until September 19 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN CRAIG AND NORTHEASTERN NOWATA COUNTIES... At 841 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southwest of Edna, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Welch... Hollow... Pyramid Corners... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
